```diff
+         document.getElementById('login-tab').addEventListener('click', function() {
+             document.getElementById('login-tab').classList.add('active');
+             document.getElementById('register-tab').classList.remove('active');
+             document.getElementById('login-pane').classList.add('active');
+             document.getElementById('register-pane').classList.remove('active');
+         });
+         
+         document.getElementById('register-tab').addEventListener('click', function() {
+             document.getElementById('register-tab').classList.add('active');
+             document.getElementById('login-tab').classList.remove('active');
+             document.getElementById('register-pane').classList.add('active');
+             document.getElementById('login-pane').classList.remove('active');
+         });
+         
+         // ç”¨æˆ·ç±»å‹é€‰æ‹©
+         const userTypes = document.querySelectorAll('.user-type');
+         userTypes.forEach(type => {
+             type.addEventListener('click', function() {
+                 userTypes.forEach(t => t.classList.remove('active'));
+                 this.classList.add('active');
+             });
+         });
+     </script>
+ </body>
+ </html>
```

```diff
+     <script>
+         // åˆ‡æ¢æ ‡ç­¾é¡µåŠŸèƒ½
+         document.getElementById('signature-tab').addEventListener('click', function() {
+             document.getElementById('signature-tab').classList.add('active');
+             document.getElementById('seal-tab').classList.remove('active');
+             document.getElementById('signature-content').classList.add('active');
+             document.getElementById('seal-content').classList.remove('active');
+         });
+         
+         document.getElementById('seal-tab').addEventListener('click', function() {
+             document.getElementById('seal-tab').classList.add('active');
+             document.getElementById('signature-tab').classList.remove('active');
+             document.getElementById('seal-content').classList.add('active');
+             document.getElementById('signature-content').classList.remove('active');
+         });
+         
+         // é€‰æ‹©ç­¾åæ ·å¼
+         const signatureOptions = document.querySelectorAll('.signature-option');
+         signatureOptions.forEach(option => {
+             option.addEventListener('click', function() {
+                 signatureOptions.forEach(opt => opt.classList.remove('active'));
+                 this.classList.add('active');
+             });
+         });
+         
+         // é€‰æ‹©å°ç« ç±»å‹
+         const sealTypes = document.querySelectorAll('.seal-type');
+         sealTypes.forEach(type => {
+             type.addEventListener('click', function() {
+                 sealTypes.forEach(t => t.classList.remove('active'));
+                 this.classList.add('active');
+             });
+         });
+         
+         // æ‰‹å†™ç­¾åCanvasåˆå§‹åŒ–
+         const canvas = document.getElementById('signatureCanvas');
+         const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');
+         let isDrawing = false;
+         
+         function resizeCanvas() {
+             const container = canvas.parentElement;
+             canvas.width = container.offsetWidth - 2; // å‡å»è¾¹æ¡†å®½åº¦
+             canvas.height = container.offsetHeight - 2;
+             
+             // è®¾ç½®çº¿æ¡æ ·å¼
+             ctx.strokeStyle = '#000';
+             ctx.lineWidth = 2;
+             ctx.lineCap = 'round';
+             ctx.lineJoin = 'round';
+         }
+         
+         function startDrawing(e) {
+             isDrawing = true;
+             draw(e);
+         }
+         
+         function stopDrawing() {
+             isDrawing = false;
+             ctx.beginPath();
+         }
+         
+         function draw(e) {
+             if (!isDrawing) return;
+             
+             const rect = canvas.getBoundingClientRect();
+             const x = e.type.includes('touch') ? 
+                 e.touches[0].clientX - rect.left : 
+                 e.clientX - rect.left;
+             const y = e.type.includes('touch') ? 
+                 e.touches[0].clientY - rect.top : 
+                 e.clientY - rect.top;
+             
+             ctx.lineTo(x, y);
+             ctx.stroke();
+             ctx.beginPath();
+             ctx.moveTo(x, y);
+         }
+         
+         // æ·»åŠ äº‹ä»¶ç›‘å¬
+         canvas.addEventListener('mousedown', startDrawing);
+         canvas.addEventListener('mousemove', draw);
+         canvas.addEventListener('mouseup', stopDrawing);
+         canvas.addEventListener('mouseout', stopDrawing);
+         
+         // è§¦æ‘¸è®¾å¤‡æ”¯æŒ
+         canvas.addEventListener('touchstart', startDrawing);
+         canvas.addEventListener('touchmove', draw);
+         canvas.addEventListener('touchend', stopDrawing);
+         
+         // åˆå§‹åŒ–Canvas
+         window.addEventListener('load', resizeCanvas);
+         window.addEventListener('resize', resizeCanvas);
+     </script>
+ </body>
+ </html> 
```

---

```diff
+         });
+         
+         // å…³é—­ç¡®è®¤å¼¹çª—
+         document.querySelector('.modal-close').addEventListener('click', function() {
+             document.querySelector('.modal-overlay').style.display = 'none';
+         });

+         // ç¡®è®¤å®ŒæˆæŒ‰é’®
+         document.querySelector('.modal-footer .btn:last-child').addEventListener('click', function() {
+             document.querySelector('.modal-overlay').style.display = 'none';

+             // åœ¨å®é™…åº”ç”¨ä¸­è¿™é‡Œä¼šè·³è½¬åˆ°åˆåŒè¯¦æƒ…æˆ–å®Œæˆé¡µé¢
```

```diff
- 
+ <!DOCTYPE html>
+ <html lang="zh-CN">
```

_**User**_

ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆä»£ç æ— æ³•åŒæ­¥åˆ°Git

---

_**Assistant**_

There could be several reasons why your code is not syncing to Git. Here are some common issues and solutions:

1. **Uncommitted Changes**: Ensure that you have committed your changes. You can do this by running:
   ```bash
   git add .
   git commit -m "Your commit message"
   ```

2. **Remote Repository**: Make sure that your local repository is linked to the correct remote repository. You can check this by running:
   ```bash
   git remote -v
   ```
   If it's not set up correctly, you can add the remote repository using:
   ```bash
   git remote add origin <repository-url>
   ```

3. **Branch Issues**: Ensure you are on the correct branch and that the branch exists on the remote. You can check your current branch with:
   ```bash
   git branch
   ```
   To push to a specific branch, use:
   ```bash
   git push origin <branch-name>
   ```

4. **Authentication Issues**: If you are having trouble with authentication, ensure that your credentials are correct. You might need to update your credentials or use an SSH key.

5. **Network Issues**: Check your internet connection to ensure there are no network issues preventing the sync.

6. **Conflicts**: If there are conflicts, Git will not allow you to push until they are resolved. You can check for conflicts with:
   ```bash
   git status
   ```

7. **Push Errors**: If you encounter errors while pushing, Git will usually provide a message indicating what went wrong. Pay attention to these messages for clues.

If you can provide more specific error messages or details about what happens when you try to sync, I can offer more targeted advice.

---

_**User**_

è¯·å¸®æˆ‘æŠŠå½“å‰ä»£ç åŒæ­¥åˆ°Git

_**Assistant**_

I'll help you sync your code to Git. First, let's check if you already have a Git repository initialized for this project.
